channel.title: Spawning
channel.description: OKAY...so i need some help, my problem is when you die were you go. ive already worked on this for about 1 hr now and went threw all the files and cant figure it out. i managed to find out how to change the location were a newcomer begins and were te home tele teleports you. i just cant figure out how to change the location were you go when you die. currently on my server when you die you go to edgeville and i would like to change that. any helps thnks!

item.title: Spawning
item.dc:creator: @resident123 resident123
item.description:
@resident123 wrote:

Its simple… Just go to the exact death spot type ::mypos search the X cord in player.java or client.java and it will say something like death Toy-Tox change them coords to your location u want

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning
item.dc:creator: @mylust4blood mylust4blood
item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

this is what you do, die in-game and write down the x coords, then in notepad ctrl+f and enter the x coords till you find a match lol

Read full topic
